metadata.title: CVE-2023-39949 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
eprosima Fast DDS is a C++ implementation of the Data Distribution Servicestandard of the Object Management Group. Prior to versions 2.9.1 and 2.6.5,improper validation of sequence numbers may lead to remotely reachableassertion failure. This can remotely crash any Fast-DDS process. Versions2.9.1 and 2.6.5 contain a patch for this issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39949` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fastdds-tools - 2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
libfastrtps2.5 - 2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: fastdds package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
